name: Torn Apart - A Love Story
description:
Controls:

Walk - left/right arrow keys

Jump - Space

Shoot Bubble - V

Monsters have invaded the world and torn two lovers apart. Help them find their way back to each other, because only together do they have the strength to defeat the monsters.

Credits:

Idea, Design, Programming, Art, Sound, Music - HauntedQuest

Font (Yoster Island) - codeman38 (https://www.1001fonts.com/yoster-island-font.html) - free for commercial and personal use

Note: The download version has some extra lighting effects which don't display on the webgl one and it generally looks nicer, so I recommend playing that if you're fine with downloading.
